description.raw:
I wrote a tutorial for the purpose of re-creating the work that Morgan and Kirsha did on the tactor glove. Think "Instructables meets Gazebo Tutorials". If you're in the office and would like to see the final product, it's sitting on my desk right now.

Warning: If you're actually trying to run the C++ code, it depends on a pull request in [handsim](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/handsim/pull-request/39/fix-contact-sensor) and a pull request in [handsim-proprietary](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/handsim-proprietary/pull-request/23/fix-contact-sensor-for-links-with-multiple).
